name: Aerial Plus
info: A high performance range of climbing shoes built on an aggressively curved last, making them perfect for overhanging routes, without sacrificing any efficiency on tiny edges or friction holds. Also offering levels of comfort previously unheard of in such high performance shoes.

name: Balance Pro
info: A high performance range of climbing shoes offering a perfect balance of features, allowing the user to achieve maximum responsiveness in all types of situations. Most effective on long, overhanging routes combining everything from boulder problem crux moves to technical edging, or tenuous smearing. These were the shoes worn by Alex Megos during his historic world's first 9a onsight ascent.

name: Step Up
info: Designed specifically to make foot placements easier and more intuitive on every type of terrain. Superbly comfortable, these are the perfect climbing shoes to improve your footwork and augment your connection to the rock.
